localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Brainiac is a database of 150 cognitive biases, principles & models that influence customer's decision, let you create better products and help you increase your sales. Every single bias includes a sketch, description, possible applications and more
nodes.title: Brainiac - Database of 150 cognitive biases that control our decisions

nodes.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
nodes.title: Figma Comments on Mobile - View and add comments on Figma using your mobile device.

nodes.excerpt: Signils has the best UI design and UX of any Bluetooth management or device locator app. Power uses can manage more devices with our images, two-column display and filters Manage devices (Bluetooth or Beacons) and selectively locate a specific a device.
nodes.title: Signils - Better Management of Bluetooth and Locate Lost Devices

nodes.excerpt: You can now speed up your workflow right from within your VS Code environment. Here are some key features of the plugin: - Preview Lottie files - Edit Lottie files - Search through animations on LottieFiles - Extract and view a dotLottie file and its contents

nodes.excerpt: Our Polaris for Admin Web UI kit is now available in Figma. You can access the full kit in Figma with reusable components and up-to-date Polaris guidelines, icons, and color palette. Find out more at https://figma.com/@shopify and https://polaris.shopify.com
